# Spectre.Console Instructions

Spectre.Console is a .NET library that makes it easy to create beautiful console applications. It provides a rich set of features for building interactive command-line interfaces, including tables, trees, progress bars, and more.

## Usage

Use GitHub MCP to retrieve the Spectre.Console documentation and source code at:

- [Documentation Root](https://github.com/spectreconsole/website/tree/main/Spectre.Docs/Content)
- [Source Code](https://github.com/spectreconsole/spectre.console)
